https://brenebrown.com/book/dare-to-lead.title: Dare to Lead
https://brenebrown.com/book/dare-to-lead.description: When we dare to lead, we don’t pretend to have the right answers; we stay curious and ask the right questions. We don’t see power as finite and hoard it; we know that power becomes infinite when we share it with others.
